metadata.title: RA Family: Where can I purchase AI Kit (AIK-RAxxx) ?

sections.content:
Question:
Where can I purchase AI Kit (AIK-RAxxx) ?
Answer:
We have two variants depending on your target use-case and performance. Please visit below link where you can select and move on for purchase.
AIK-RA6M3 https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/aik-ra6m3-ai-kit-reference-platform-ra6m3
AIK-RA4E1 https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/aik-ra4e1-ai-kit-reference-platform-ra4e1
Suitable Products
AIK-RA6M3
AIK-RA4E1
